Material used.Description: EGFP reporter with let-7-binding sites was used to assess miRNA activity.

Readout description.Result Description: Pathogenic variants (I1915T and G2019S) caused increased EGFP expression compared to wild-type.
Pathogenic variants (I1915T and G2019S) caused increased EGFP expression compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or wild-type miRNA was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: EGFP expression levels consistent with wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: EGFP expression levels exceeding wild-type by more than 20%.

Material used.Description: RNAi was used to knock down LRRK2 expression to study functional effects.

Readout description.Result Description: RNAi targeting LRRK2 reduced protein levels, confirming functional impact of the mutation.
RNAi targeting LRRK2 reduced protein levels, confirming functional impact of the mutation.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or non-targeting siRNA was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LRRK2 protein expression levels within 10% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LRRK2 protein expression levels below 50% of wild-type.
